/** HOW TO ADD THIS TO YOUR CODE
1. Create a new class called the name of the inventory plus "Inventory" (E.g. MainMenuInventory).
2. Copy and paste the code into that class.
Note: If you're using an IDE, you should see some errors. These errors there because those objects have not been imported yet. Simply import those objects to remove the error.
3. Go to your main class, and create a new field at the top of the class and then create a new instance of the class.

Once you do these three steps, you can access your inventory by using
   -[FiledName].getInventory()
Where the [FieldName] is the field that you created at the top of the main class in step 3.
